result.execSummary:
The defendant Patrick Arturego Isiakpere was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Battery, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 940.19(1).
  • Battery, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 940.19(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

defendant.name: Isiakpere, Patrick Arturego
defendant.address: St. Croix County Jail 1101 Carmichael Road, Hudson, WI 54016

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: for certified copies. Filed by ACA R. Hansch. Mailed on 4/8/2016. km
c: Def, Atty, DA, SCSO & Jail. eif
c: Def & Atty. eif

CO: Lundell, RPR: Val Deiss, Clerk: Fox, ADA: Alexis S. Mckinley, DF ATTY:  John A. Kucinski, DF:  Patrick Arturego Isiakpere appeared from jail. There is an agreement. Court reviews constitutional rights with def. Court finds def freely, voluntarily and knowingly waives rights. 
Court amends count 1 to 940.19(1) - misd battery  & count 2 to 940.19(1) - misd. battery; repeater STRICKEN for both counts. 
Court reads charge and possible penalties for counts 1 & 2, as amended. Def pleads no contest. Court uses complaints/prelim as factual basis, accepts plea and adjudicates def guilty of count 1 and 2, as amended. Court orders for cts 1 & 2; concurrent: 6 months in SCC Jail and also concurrent to prison sentence.
Court costs are suspended. Defendant is advised of right to appeal.
Status conference on October 15, 2014 at 11:15 am.

CO: Lundell, RPR: Val Deiss, Clerk: Fox, ADA:   Alexis S. Mckinley, DF ATTY:  John A. Kucinski, DF:  Patrick Arturego Isiakpere appeared from jail. Attorney's discuss defendant status.  Status conference scheduled for October 15, 2014 at 11:15 am.

Jury trial on January 21, 2015 at 09:00 am.

CO: Lundell, RPR: Val Deiss, Clerk: Fox, ADA: Alexis S. Mckinley, DF ATTY:  John A. Kucinski, DF:  Patrick Arturego Isiakpere appeared from jail. Set for a plea hearing. There is not an agreement. Atty Kucinski requests a trial date be set and to have the defendant brought back for a trial. He has been sentenced to prison for approx. 18 months. Bond is not set; defendant is waiting transport to Dodge. Jury trial scheduled for January 21, 2015 at 09:00 am.
